I have very small percentage of body fat but still my weight is 88kg.
Two doctors have confirmed that this is very good and normal for my height.
But I feel like this makes me slow on the field and doesnâ€™t allow me to move and change directions as fast as I can and wsnt.
I have set a goal now by challenging myself to lose 8kg but still maintain muscle ğŸ’ªğŸ¾
I am telling you because I want you to also help and hold me accountable.
